name: Adam Lewenhaupt
obverse: Bust of Adam Lewenhaupt facing left.
reverse: Inscription in 8 lines. There are 7 stars around the inscription. Below is a Cross of Lorraine which is a symbol of Timmermansorden (Timber Order).
reverse_inscriptions: DEN AVHÅLLNE HÖVDINGEN DEN HJÄRTEVARME BRODERN DEN SANNE ÄDLINGEN
description: This medal was commissioned by the Timmermansorden to commemorate Adam Lewenhaupt, a Grand Master of the order.
There were around 150 examples minted in bronze and silver.
